name: The m0rg VS keys
description: In this game you have to collect as many keys as you can. They will fly around in a location with ever increasing complexity. Beat the records! Be the best!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 32-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 Gb Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 32-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2 Gb Storage: 1 GB available space
